elabftw
  • Docs »
  • Welcome to elabftw’s documentation!
  • View page source

Welcome to elabftw’s documentation!¶

eLabFTW is a PHP application using MySQL to store data persistently. Once installed on a server, users can register an account and start using their electronic lab notebook. Several teams can be hosted on the same install. Check out the list of features.

There is an online demo directly accessible at this address: https://demo.elabftw.net

The official website is here: http://www.elabftw.net

There are multiple ways to install elabftw, see the left menu to choose which one you want.

    • Add the secret key
    • Failed creating uploads/ directory
    • Extension is not loaded
    • I can’t upload a file bigger than 2 Mb
    • I can’t export my (numerous) experiments in zip, I get an error 500
    • Languages don’t work

    • Make sure that the uploads folder cannot be accessed
    • Set up backup
